entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of rain this morning and ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
